reviewText: A really good DVD for discussion and thought about why things happen to us in life and how God is for us behind the scenes.

Our group of 15-20 very heterogeneous youth (variety of race, class, etc. in our group) was very engaged by Craig DeMartino's story of survival. They took his struggles to heart and got into good discussion of the story of Job through Craig's challenges. The study was relatable to them and very easy to implement in our weekly youth group.
